title: kerning in fontforge
author: PoohBear

comments.content:
Did you turn the kerning on?  
Pablo's page - [http://www.impallari.com/testing/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130514/http:/www.impallari.com/testing/ "http://www.impallari.com/testing/") is an excellent tool for testing. Under "OpenType Features" you can set desired feature and watch changes.
